text: Dallas James Liu (born August 21, 2001) is an American actor and martial artist. His early roles were as Jin Kazama in Tekken (2009). He also appeared on the television series PEN15 and Legendary Dudas. He is known for playing Prince Zuko in the Netflix live action television remake of Avatar: The Last Airbender. Liu grew up in San Gabriel Valley, California. ==References== Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American mixed martial artists Category:American child actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: Dallas Liu
